Name: Dirty Sanchez
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: A Tequila Sour with delicate berry fruit, lengthened and invigorated with ginger beer.
History: Created in 2001 by Phillip Jeffrey and Ian Baldwin at the GE Club in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Dirty Sanchez contains 291 calories
